EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_DS for Auto Clustering for IT_Q314.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal Data Labs and DSC on September 30
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
IT departments within large organizations struggle with a common problem of infrastructure and operational management. Infrastructure components that support business-critical applications generate thousands of alerts per day. Additionally, thousands of incident tickets are created manually. Analyzing all of these alerts and incidents is both labor-intensive and expensive.
In this webinar <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=848119&s=1&k=E7F0702F0E26F154BD0DDA18CB9E8485&partnerref=pivotal>, Regunathan Radhakrishnan (Principal Data Scientist, Pivotal) will present a framework that was developed to automatically cluster alerts to help IT departments understand the issues that keep their support personnel busy, determine the mean-time-to-repair for a group of alerts, and more. Join us <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=848119&s=1&k=E7F0702F0E26F154BD0DDA18CB9E8485&partnerref=pivotal> to learn how these insights can help organizations improve their operational efficiency.
REGISTER >> <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=848119&s=1&k=E7F0702F0E26F154BD0DDA18CB9E8485&partnerref=pivotal>
We look forward to seeing you there,
The Pivotal Team USING DATA SCIENCE TECHNIQUES FOR AUTOMATIC CLUSTERING OF IT INFRASTRUCTURE ALERTS
TUESDAY SEPTEMBER 30, 2014 9:00AM PDT REGISTER <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=848119&s=1&k=E7F0702F0E26F154BD0DDA18CB9E8485&partnerref=pivotal>
